pages.title: Gopher Tortoise
pages.text: The gopher tortoise ($(o)Gopherus polyphemus$()) is a species of tortoise in the family Testudinidae.$(br2)The species is native to the southeastern United States.$(br2)The gopher tortoise is seen as a keystone species because it digs burrows that provide shelter for at least 360 other animal species.
